tags.name: UPS-RS
tags.description: RESTful interface to the Unified Procedure Step Service SOP Classes

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The Acceptable Media Types for the response payload.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The Acceptable Media Types for the response payload.

parameters.name: transferSyntax
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the Transfer Syntax in which the returned DICOM Instance shall be encoded.

400.description: There was a problem with the request.

410.description: The resource corresponding to the UIDs in the Query Parameters, once existed, but no longer exists.

get.summary: Retrieve Rendered Instance by URI Service

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The Acceptable Media Types for the response payload.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The Acceptable Media Types for the response payload.

parameters.name: frameNumber
parameters.description: This parameter specifies which rendered single frame within a multi-frame image Instance shall be returned.

parameters.name: imageQuality
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the requested quality of the rendered images or video.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the number of pixel rows in the returned image.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the number of pixel columns in the returned image.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: This parameter specifies a rectangular region of the Target Resource in format "xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax".

parameters.name: windowCenter
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the Window Center of the returned image.

parameters.name: windowWidth
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the Window Width of the returned image.

parameters.name: presentationSeriesUID
parameters.description: This parameter specifies the Series containing the Presentation State Instance to be used to render the image.

parameters.name: presentationUID
parameters.description: This parameter identifies the Presentation State Instance, which is used to render the image.

charset-qp.name: charset
charset-qp.description: Comma-separated list of Acceptable Character Sets of the response payload.

charset-hp.name: Accept-Charset
charset-hp.description: The Acceptable Character Sets of the response payload.

study.name: study
study.description: The Study Instance UID of a Study managed by the Studies Service.

series.name: series
series.description: The Series Instance UID of a Series contained within a Study resource.

instance.name: instance
instance.description: The SOP Instance UID of an Instance contained within a Series resource.

frames.name: frames
frames.description: A comma-separated list of frame numbers, in ascending order, contained within an Instance.

bulkdata.name: bulkdata
bulkdata.description: An opaque URI that references a Bulkdata Value.

deletionlock.name: deletionlock
deletionlock.description: If present with a value of true the Subscription will be created with a Deletion Lock.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Comma-separated list of one or more matching keys (attribute/value pairs). A Workitem Subscription will be created/suspended for any existing and future Workitem that matches the attribute/value pairs of the filter.

match.name: match
match.description: One or more DICOM Attribute/Values pairs specify the matching criteria for the search.

fuzzymatching.name: fuzzymatching
fuzzymatching.description: A single parameter specifies whether Fuzzy Matching of Person Names is to be performed.

includefield.name: includefield
includefield.description: A parameter specifies the Attributes that should be included in the response. The value is either a comma-separated list of attributes, or the single keyword "all", which means that all available attributes of the object should be included in the response.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: A single parameter specifies the maximum number of matches the origin server shall return in a single response.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: A single parameter specifies the number of matches the origin server shall skip before the first returned match.

requestType.name: requestType
requestType.description: This parameter specifies that this is a URI Service request.

studyUID.name: studyUID
studyUID.description: This parameter specifies the Study Instance UID of the requested Instance.

seriesUID.name: seriesUID
seriesUID.description: This parameter specifies the Series Instance UID of the requested Instance.

objectUID.name: objectUID
objectUID.description: This parameter specifies the SOP Instance UID of the requested Instance.

anonymize.name: anonymize
anonymize.description: This parameter specifies that the returned representations shall have all Individually Identifiable Information (III) removed.

annotation.name: annotation
annotation.description: This parameter specifies that the rendered image shall be annotated with patient and/or procedure information.

quality.name: quality
quality.description: This parameter specifies the requested quality of the rendered images or video.

viewport.name: viewport
viewport.description: This parameter specifies a rectangular region of the source image(s) or video to be cropped, and a rectangular region corresponding to the size of the user agent's viewport to which the cropped image or video should be scaled. Format: vw,vh[,[sx],[sy],[sw],[sh]].

viewport-thumbnail.name: viewport
viewport-thumbnail.description: This parameter specifies the width and height, in pixels, of the returned thumbnail. Format: vw,vh.

window.name: window
window.description: This parameter controls the windowing of the images or video. Format: center,width,function.

iccprofile.name: iccprofile
iccprofile.description: This parameter specifies the color characteristics of, and inclusion of an ICC Profile in, the rendered images.

searchResults.description: The search completed successfully, and the results are contained in the payload

storeInstancesSuccessful.description: The origin server successfully stored all Instances.

storeInstancesWarnings.description: The origin server stored some of the Instances but warnings or failures exist for others.

storeInstancesConflict.description: The request was formed correctly but the origin server was unable to store any instances due to a conflict in the request.

retrievedInstances.description: The response payload contains representations for all of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedInstancesPartial.description: The response payload contains representations for some, but not all, of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedMetadata.description: The response payload contains representations for all of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedMetadataPartial.description: The response payload contains representations for some, but not all, of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedRendered.description: The response payload contains representation for all of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedRenderedPartial.description: The response payload contains representations for some, but not all, of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedRenderedFrames.description: The response payload contains representation for all of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedRenderedFramesPartial.description: The response payload contains representations for some, but not all, of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedThumbnail.description: The response payload contains a thumbnail for the Target Resource

retrievePixelData.description: The response payload contains representations for all of the Target Resource(s).

retrievePixelDataPartial.description: The response payload contains representations for some, but not all, of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedBulkdata.description: The response payload contains representations for all of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedBulkdataPartial.description: The response payload contains representations for some, but not all, of the Target Resource(s).

retrievedWorkitem.description: The response payload contains the requested Workitem.
